channel.title: Support on amanda
channel.description: Recent content in Support on amanda

item.title: Commercial support for Amanda
item.description: This is an open source site. Please refer the TO DO LIST to contribute to this site. Commercial support for Amanda We have assembled a list of companies and people who are available to provide some sort of commercial support for amanda. Although Amanda is provided as-is, some consultants and companies have made their services available to provide more support beyond what’s available on the mailing lists. If you want to be on this list, please Contact us.
